basics.name: Shubham Gosain
basics.label: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
basics.summary: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) with over 7 years of experience optimizing and managing infrastructure across AWS and on-prem Linux environments. Proven expertise in designing and maintaining scalable, high-performance systems with a strong emphasis on automation and reliability. Proficient in platforms like Kubernetes and Openstack, and experienced building robust CI/CD pipelines. Extensive experienced writing automation tools, internal APIs, and infrastructure-as-code solutions that significantly reduce manual effort and streamline operations.

work.name: GoDaddy
work.summary: Ensuring 99.99% uptime for millions of payment customers. Handling a good chunk of operational automation writing scripts, salt states and ansible playbook to reduce turnaround time.
highlights: IAC rewrite and EKS Clusters upgrade while achieving zero downtime for merchant stores and transaction dashboards.
Setup Starrocks to allow customer query billions of transactions with benchmark under 0.5s/query performance.
Drafted migration plan for Data Warehouse from EKS to EC2 ensuring 100% uptime.
Wrote pluggable TLS automations saving 30-120 minutes per cert and eliminating human error.
Analysed, tuned and migrated apps from EC2 to ECS saving ~40% of running costs.
Wrote operators and controllers for K8s clusters to achieve near zero operational overhead.
Drafted GHA and CICD pipelines across platforms for automated releases.

work.name: One.com
work.summary: Infrastructure lead for India Office. Designed and developed technical solutions across different teams and products.
highlights: Managed application CI/CD, infra, deployments, analytics, and monitoring as Infrastructure lead.
Performed operational activities as System Administrator for one year, monitoring the entire org infra.
Led a team of developers and contributed to training for interns and new joiners.
